title: "Acetylation ODEs"
output:
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---

## Ac-CoA1
PDHA1 + ACSS1 - CS
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAc-CoA1}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, PDHA1} \times [PDHA1] \times [Pyruvate] \times [NAD^+] \times [CoA1]}{(K_{m, PDHA1, Pyruvate}+ [Pyruvate])(K_{m, PDHA1, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])(K_{m, PDHA1, CoA1} + [CoA1])}\\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, ACSS1} \times [ACSS1] \times [Acetate] \times [CoA1]}{(K_{m, ACSS1, Acetate} + [Acetate])(K_{m, ACSS1, CoA} + [CoA1])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, CS} \times [CS] \times [OXa] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{(K_{m, CS, OXa} + [OXa])(K_{m, CS, Ac-CoA1} + [Ac-CoA1])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Citrate
CS - ACO2 - ACLY
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dCitrate}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, CS} \times [CS] \times [OXa] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{(K_{m, CS, OXa} + [OXa])(K_{m, CS, Ac-CoA1} + Ac-CoA1)}\\
&- (\frac{K_{cat, ACO2_1} \times [ACO2] \times [Citrate]}{K_{m, ACO2, Citrate} + [Citrate]} - \frac{K_{cat, ACO2_2} \times [ACO2] \times [Isocitrate]}{K_{m, ACO2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]})\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACLY} \times [ACLY] \times [Citrate] \times [CoA2]}{(K_{m, ACLY, Citrate} + [Citrate])(K_{m, ACLY, CoA2} + [CoA2])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Isocitrate
ACO2 - IDH2
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dIsocitrate}{dt} = &(\frac{K_{cat, ACO2_1} \times [ACO2] \times [Citrate]}{K_{m, ACO2, Citrate} + [Citrate]} - \frac{K_{cat, ACO2_2} \times [ACO2] \times [Isocitrate]}{K_{m, ACO2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]})\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, IDH2} \times [IDH2] \times [Isocitrate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, IDH2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate])(K_{m, IDH2, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Alpha-KG
IDH2 - OGDH
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAlphaKG}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, IDH2} \times [IDH2] \times [Isocitrate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, IDH2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate])(K_{m, IDH2, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, OGDH} \times [OGDH] \times [AlphaKG] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, OGDH, AlphaKG} + [AlphaKG])(K_{m, OGDH, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## OXa
OGDH + PC - CS
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dOXa}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, OGDH} \times [OGDH] \times [AlphaKG] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, OGDH, AlphaKG} + [AlphaKG])(K_{m, OGDH, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, PC} \times [PC] \times [Pyruvate] \times [HCO_3^-]}{(K_{m, PC, Pyruvate} + [Pyruvate])(K_{m, PC, HCO_3^-} + [HCO_3^-])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, CS} \times [CS] \times [OXa] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{(K_{m, CS, OXa} + [OXa])(K_{m, CS, Ac-CoA1} + [Ac-CoA1])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Ac-CoA2
ACLY + ACSS2 - ACACA - FASN - HMGCS1 - KAT2A - ACOT12
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAc-CoA2}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, ACLY} \times [ACLY] \times [Citrate] \times [CoA2]}{(K_{m, ACLY, Citrate} + [Citrate])(K_{m, ACLY, CoA2} + [CoA2])} \\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, ACSS2} \times [ACSS2] \times [Acetate] \times [CoA2]}{(K_{m, ACSS2, Acetate} + [Acetate])(K_{m, ACSS2, CoA} + [CoA2])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACACA} \times [ACACA] \times [Ac-CoA2] \times [HCO_3^-]}{(K_{m, ACACA, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2])(K_{m, ACACA, HCO_3^-} + [HCO_3^-])}\\
&-2 \times \frac{k_{cat, FASN} \times [FASN] \times [Ac-CoA2]^2 \times [HCO_3^-] \times [NADPH]^2}{(K_{m, FASN, AcCoA2} + [Ac-CoA2])^2(K_{m, FASN, HCO_3^-} + [HCO_3^-])(K_{m, FASN, NADPH} + [NADPH])^2}\\
&-3 \times \frac{K_{cat, HMGCS1} \times [HMGCS1] \times [Ac-CoA2]^3}{(K_{m, ACAT2, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2])^2(K_{m, HMGCS1, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, KAT2A} \times [KAT2A] \times [Ac-CoA2]}{K_{m, KAT2A, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACOT12} \times [ACOT12] \times [Ac-CoA2]}{K_{m, ACOT12, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Acetate
SLC16A3 + HDAC1 + HDAC2 + HDAC3 + ACOT12 - ACSS1 - ACSS2
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAcetate}{dt} = &V_{max, SLC16A3} \times [\frac{[Acetate]_{blood}}{[Acetate]_{blood} + K_{T, Acetate}} - \frac{[Acetate]}{[Acetate] + K_{T, Acetate}}]\\
&+ K_{cat, HDAC1} \times [HDAC1]\\
&+ K_{cat, HDAC2} \times [HDAC2]\\
&+ K_{cat, HDAC3} \times [HDAC3]\\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, ACOT12} \times [ACOT12] \times [Ac-CoA2]}{K_{m, ACOT12, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACSS1} \times [ACSS1] \times [Acetate] \times [CoA1]}{(K_{m, ACSS1, Acetate} + [Acetate]) \times (K_{m, ACSS1, CoA} + [CoA1])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACSS2} \times [ACSS2] \times [Acetate] \times [CoA2]}{(K_{m, ACSS2, Acetate} + [Acetate]) \times (K_{m, ACSS2, CoA} + [CoA2])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## $NAD^+$
v_NAD - PDHA1 - IDH2 - OGDH
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dNAD^+}{dt} = &\frac{V_{ATP, ss}}{n_{ATP:NAD^+}} \times \frac{[NADH]}{[NADH]_{ss}}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, PDHA1} \times [PDHA1] \times [Pyruvate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, PDHA1, Pyruvate} + [Pyruvate]) \times (K_{m, PDHA1, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, IDH2} \times [IDH2] \times [Isocitrate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, IDH2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]) \times (K_{m, IDH2, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, OGDH} \times [OGDH] \times [AlphaKG] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, OGDH, AlphaKG} + [AlphaKG]) \times (K_{m, OGDH, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}
\end{aligned}
$$
